title: JavaScript Level 5 â€” Arrays & Basic Operations
concept: Use arrays to store collections and perform sum and max operations.

challenges.title: Sum of Array Elements
challenges.description: Given N and an array of N integers, print the sum of all elements.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers separated by space.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of the array elements.

challenges.title: Maximum Element in Array
challenges.description: Given N and an array of N integers, print the maximum element.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
